name: HyperDice
description:
This project was intended to be part of GMTK's 2022 game jam, but we missed the deadline due to technical issues with the server. However, you can still enjoy the game, traversing a platform with a dice and carefully managing your moves to solve puzzles.

The downloadable version should look slightly better because of the rendering limitations of exporting from Godot to HTML5.

Use the arrow keys (or WASD) to move the dice and the ESC button to pause and see your score!
